title: Hour 2 - Geoff Schwartz (03-30-20)
itunes:title: Hour 2 - Geoff Schwartz (03-30-20)
description:
Jason Smith and Doug Gottlieb, in for Dan Patrick, look at the Patriots QB odds and discuss if Cam Newton is a fit in New England. Former NFL OL Geoff Schwartz joins the guys to explain why he believes Cam deserves a starting job, and looks at where Jameis Winston will land. Plus, the guys talk the possibility of the college football and NFL seasons being impacted by the coronavirus.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
